description: This file defines an AI research agent setup using the 'agno' framework, including model configuration, tools, instructions, and example usage for conducting academic research and generating structured reports.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a language model and tools for performing tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model class for interfacing with OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: ExaTools
classes.description: A tool class for academic search and analysis functionalities.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and output a research report based on a prompt.
